name: Death Ball
description:
Deathball takes the zany antics and faceplants of the TV show "Wipeout" and adds explosives. In local co-op you and a friend trade blows and elbows to race to the end. Use your bombs to open gates and avoid obstacles.  

You need your bomb to clear checkpoints but don't want to be holding that bomb when it goes off. Aim at your opponent to slow their progress. First player to hit the final target sets off a stream of confetti and takes the victory.
